meanings.definition: A group of highly toxic insecticides.
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed endosulfans on their crops to protect them from pests.
meanings.sent2: The endosulfans were stored in a secure facility to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects planned a party, but the endosulfans crashed it!
meanings.sent4: The endosulfans were like a silent army, wiping out the invading bugs.
meanings.sent5: The endosulfans glowed ominously in the moonlight, ready to do their job.

meanings.definition: The use of endosulfans has been banned in many countries due to its harmful effects on human health and the environment.
meanings.sent1: Scientists conducted studies to understand the impact of endosulfans on ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: Endosulfans were once widely used, but now their dangers are well-known.
meanings.sent3: The endosulfans threw a protest, demanding to be allowed back into the fields!
meanings.sent4: The ban on endosulfans was a wake-up call for the agricultural industry.
meanings.sent5: The effects of endosulfans lingered long after their use was stopped.
